publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1393 Mr Duncan McNeil: Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd.—That the Parliament expresses concern over the recent announcement of redundancies at Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd. in Inverclyde; notes that the redundancies will not commence until February 2001, and encourages all parties and agencies involved to work together in the intervening period to minimise the impact of these redundancies.
S1M-1393 Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd. (lodged on 24 November 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1393 Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd. (lodged on 24 November 2000) Tommy Sheridan*, Alex Neil*, Trish Godman*

S1M-1393 Mr Duncan McNeil: Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd.-That the Parliament expresses concern over the recent announcement of redundancies at Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd. in Inverclyde; notes that the redundancies will not commence until February 2001, and encourages all parties and agencies involved to work together in the intervening period to minimise the impact of these redundancies. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Fiona McLeod*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-1393 Fullarton Computer Industries (Gourock) Ltd. (lodged on 24 November 2000) Donald Gorrie*

Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Fiona McLeod, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, David Mundell, Mr Duncan Hamilton*

Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Trish Godman, Fiona McLeod, Mr Adam Ingram, Donald Gorrie, Ms Sandra White, Michael Russell, David Mundell, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Pauline McNeill, Andrew Wilson
